allow: Bash(# Check the latest debug file for rate-limit headers cat ~/.claude/debug/latest)
Bash(# Check if the reference project writes to this path grep -r ""claude_quota"" /Users/dl/GitHub/statusline/Claude-Code-Usage-Monitor-main/)

Bash(# Check the Claude-Code-Usage-Monitor reference project for quota JSON writing ls /Users/dl/GitHub/statusline/Claude-Code-Usage-Monitor-main/src/ && grep -rl ""claude_quota\\|quota.*json\\|/tmp/"" /Users/dl/GitHub/statusline/Claude-Code-Usage-Monitor-main/)

Bash(# Look at git log to see when the quota file approach was originally created git -C /Users/dl/GitHub/statusline log --all --oneline -- src/statusline/quota.py echo ""==="" # Check the initial commit for hints about the quota.json source git -C /Users/dl/GitHub/statusline log --format=""%H %s"")
Bash(# Check the initial run.sh for how quota.json was generated git -C /Users/dl/GitHub/statusline show 6c8b752:run.sh)
Bash(# Check the initial commit''s run.sh for the quota generation logic git -C /Users/dl/GitHub/statusline show 6c8b752:run.sh)
Bash(# Search for anything that writes to claude_quota.json on the entire system grep -rl ""claude_quota"" ~/.claude/ /tmp/ ~/GitHub/statusline/)
Bash(# Check the plan file that mentions claude_quota - it might reveal who writes it grep -B5 -A10 ""claude_quota"" ~/.claude/plans/snappy-seeking-meerkat.md)
Bash(# Check the usage-monitor.sh more carefully for any quota writing grep -n ""quota\\|/tmp/claude"" ~/.claude/usage-monitor.sh)
Bash(# Let''s search the entire home directory for scripts that write to this exact path grep -rl ""claude_quota\\.json"" ~/GitHub/ ~/.claude/ ~/.local/)
Bash(# Let''s check if Claude Code''s JS/TS source has any reference to writing quota ls ~/.local/share/claude/versions/2.1.39/)

Bash(# Let''s look at what Claude Code tracks at runtime. Check if there''s a usage API it calls # The debug log might show API calls to a usage endpoint grep -i ""usage\\|rate.limit\\|quota\\|billing"" ~/.claude/debug/f48e0b23-76fa-4359-a827-5f9280ef2f3b.txt)
Bash(# Check the CURRENT session''s debug log for usage-related calls grep -i ""usage\\|/usage\\|rate.limit\\|quota"" ~/.claude/debug/f48e0b23*.txt)
Bash(# Look at one JSONL file to understand the data format find ~/.claude/projects -name ""*.jsonl"" -not -path ""*/subagents/*"" -type f -exec stat -f ''%m %N'' {} \\;)

Bash(# Check what the last user prompt extraction would show right now transcript=""/Users/dl/.claude/projects/-Users-dl-GitHub-statusline/b28eed47-215f-493c-8ed9-b911e80cdbc5.jsonl"" tail -500 ""$transcript"" \\ | grep ''""type"":""user""\\|""type"": ""user""'' \\ | jq -r ''[\(.message.content // .content // []\)[] | select\(.type == ""text""\) | .text] | join\("" ""\)'' \\)

Bash(# Test the fix transcript=""/Users/dl/.claude/projects/-Users-dl-GitHub-statusline/b28eed47-215f-493c-8ed9-b911e80cdbc5.jsonl"" tail -500 ""$transcript"" \\ | grep ''""type"":""user""\\|""type"": ""user""'' \\ | jq -r '' \(.message.content // .content // """"\) | if type == ""string"" then . elif type == ""array"" then [.[] | select\(.type == ""text""\) | .text] | join\("" ""\) else """" end '' \\)
